title: HOPPER: An American love story - About the documentary | American Masters |
excerpt: Discover the secrets behind Edward Hopper’s most iconic and enigmatic works. See how his marriage to artist Josephine Hopper shaped his art.

title: The Art of the Shadow: How Painters Have Gotten It Wrong for Centuries
excerpt: The goal is not to expose the “slipups” of the masters but to understand the human brain.

title: Pop Culture Posters & Illustrations by Tomasz Majewski
excerpt: Polish illustrator and graphic designer Tomasz Majewski combines traditional techniques with digital work to produce cool pop culture creations.  More: Instagram, Behance

title: How Bullwinkle Taught Kids Sophisticated Political Satire
